text: The velar ejective is a type of consonantal sound, used in some spoken languages. The symbol in the International Phonetic Alphabet that represents this sound is . ==Features== Features of the velar ejective: ==Occurrence== {| class="wikitable" ! colspan=2 | Language !! Word !!
